tier.item: (1) German
a. Anna hat mit jemandem gesprochen, aber ich weiß nicht,
Anna has with someone spoken but I know not
*(mit) wem.
with who
`Anna talked with someone, but I don't know (with) who.'
(1) German
a. Anna hat mit jemandem gesprochen, aber ich weiß nicht,
Anna has with someone spoken but I know not
*(mit) wem.
with who
`Anna talked with someone, but I don't know (with) who.'

Anna has with someone spoken but I know not with who

Anna talked with someone, but I don't know (with) who.

who has she with spoken
(`Who did she talk with?')

who has she with spoken
(`Who did she talk with?')

who has she with spoken

I.have a.ACC new. ACC car. ACC and a. ACC old.ACC

(`How heavily haired a man did she meet?')

he is heavily haired but I know not how heavily

tier.item: (154) Theli na vri ena imerologio pu na exi grapsi enas stratigos

remember which (general).'
